transArray.content: Dear guest, thank you for your review of the hotel! The store has 20 parking spaces, which are provided free of charge to guests. The hotel is very close to Wanliu, Changchun Bridge, Suzhou Bridge Station of Metro Line 16, and Bagou Station of Metro Line 10. It is also adjacent to Beijing Renmin University and Beijing University of Science and Technology, making travel convenient! Looking forward to your patronage again!
